title: Any Living Parents
question: A oedd gan {deceasedName} unrhyw rieni byw adeg eu marwolaeth?
paragraph1: This does not include any step-parents.
paragraph2: If {deceasedName} was legally adopted, this includes their adoptive parents, but not their biological parents.

anyLivingParents.required: Select 'Yes' if any of {deceasedName}'s parents were alive when {deceasedName} died
